Look, those sheep out there, they're blind. They swallow whatever the system feeds them, never questioning, never thinking for themselves. It makes me sick.  They're divided already, ripe for the picking.  

The easiest way to get them riled up? Play on their fears.  Pit them against each other.

Chaos is a ladder. The more they fight amongst themselves, the weaker the system becomes. And when it crumbles, well, then we'll see who's really in control.
